publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-07-16T10:05-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: This small collection contains the collected papers of Mark Rosenthal regarding AFSCME, District Council 37, Local 983. The collection includes clippings, newsletters, election materials, and a discrimination complaint by Rosenthal against the union.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Mark Rosenthal sent a gift of his papers in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.035.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains the collected papers of Mark Rosenthal regarding AFSCME, District Council 37, Local 983. The collection includes clippings, newsletters, election materials, and a discrimination complaint by Rosenthal against the union.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Mark Rosenthal are held by Mark Rosenthal. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Mark Rosenthal.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Mark Rosenthal Papers; WAG 289; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
